summary: Implements a 2‑dimensional conditional UNet architecture tailored for the AudioLDM2 latent diffusion model, providing initialization and helper methods to instantiate the model from configuration data or pretrained checkpoints.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly set up and deploy a conditional UNet for audio generation within the AudioLDM2 diffusion framework, supporting custom configurations and loading of pretrained weights for high‑quality audio synthesis.
